txt.en: 'You may have seen some beggars and other sorry sorts milling about, seeking a handout of food or coin. You'd best pay them no mind. The mayor has no love for them -- those are the very workers who stood up to his new policies. He made quite the show of addressing their insubordination! Now they have no employment, no food, and no money; he makes sure Guard Kember keeps them away from the Festival. They are less welcome than anyone, and there will be trouble if they don't mind their place.'
Who are those sad people in the alleys?
